text: The Price to Pay () is a 2007 French comedy film directed by Alexandra Leclère. == Cast == * Christian Clavier - Jean-Pierre Ménard * Nathalie Baye - Odile Ménard * Gérard Lanvin - Richard * Géraldine Pailhas - Caroline * Patrick Chesnais - Grégoire * Anaïs Demoustier - Justine Ménard ==References== == External links == * Category:2007 comedy films Category:French films Category:French comedy films
title: The Price to Pay (film)
